code: import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import"../style/banner.scss";import ImgBandeau from"../assets/images/Image source 1.png";import ImgAbout from"../assets/images/Image source 2.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Bandeau(){const location=useLocation();let image,altText,imgClass;if(location.pathname==="/"){image=ImgBandeau;altText="photo représentant la mer";imgClass="img-base img-acceuil";}else if(location.pathname==="/About"){image=ImgAbout;altText="photo représentant la montagne";imgClass="img-base img-about";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bandeau",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"img-base",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:altText,className:imgClass}),location.pathname==="/"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Chez vous, partout et ailleurs"}),location.pathname==="/About"]})});}
